subject: No tests found warning in ecilpse test runner
msgSnippet: Hello, During work, I ve encountered the following problem: We defined a base class, joint for some test classes. The base class has no tests, but it inherits
messageBody:
Hello,

During work, I've encountered the following problem:
We defined a base class, joint for some test classes. The base class
has no tests, but it inherits from testCase.
The base class has some sub-classes, which contain tests.

When running in eclipse, the testrunner complains it has no tests (it
throws an AssertionFailedError: No tests foundÂ…).

I'll be very grateful for any help.

Amit
